item.title: Sprinkle some HATEOAS on your Rails APIs
item.description: REST as a concept was introduced by Roy Fielding in his doctoral thesis, named Architectural Styles and the Design of Network-based Software Architectures. 16 years later, REST as an architecture is the most widely accepted way to design and build APIs. I am sure we have all heard about it, and most of us think we are building actual RESTful APIs. But, are we? Let’s remind ourselves what REST is and then continue on something else that supplements REST, called HATEOAS.
